Search Search Search ﻿ Johan Holmgren Associate Professor/Head of unit/Senior lecturer johan.holmgren@mau.se +46 40 665 76 88 orcid.org/0000-0001-7773-9944 Employed at Faculty of Technology and Society Department of Computer Science and Media Technology Research subject Computer Sciences Presentation I am working as associate professor in computer science at Malmö University. My research interests are mainly within the application of computer science and mathematical methods within the area of health logistics, and transport and traffic modeling. Publications 2025 | Conference paper Quality Clustering for Reducing the Search Space for Mobile Stroke Unit Allocation Muhammad Adil Abid, Johan Holmgren, Fabian Lorig, Jesper Petersson 2025 | Article in journal Implementing Dynamic Travel Time Calculation in EMS Simulations: Impacts on Prehospital Stroke Care and Transportation Saeid Amouzad Mahdiraji, Marcus Juninger, Nicholas Narvell, Johan Holmgren, Radu-Casian Mihailescu, Jesper Petersson 2024 | Article in journal Integrating Machine Learning-Based Ambulance Travel Time Estimation into an Emergency Medical Services Simulation Modeling Framework Saeid Amouzad Mahdiraji, Muhammad Adil Abid, Johan Holmgren 2024 | Conference paper An Enhanced Genetic Algorithm With Clustering for Optimizing Mobile Stroke Unit Deployment Muhammad Adil Abid, Johan Holmgren, Fabian Lorig, Jesper Petersson 2024 | Article in journal Addressing Local and Regional Recharging Demand: Allocation of Charging Stations through Iterative Route Analysis Henrik Fredriksson, Mattias Dahl, Johan Holmgren, Benny Lövström See all Publications in Diva Research Projects You can find previous research projects in the Diva database. Previous research projects in Diva Activities My homepage Publication list My research environments Sustainable Digitalisation Research Centre The research centre studies both social and technological aspects to promote sustainable digitalisation.
